title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What did the interpreters say about the interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman? Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman in a dream has hundreds of meanings given by jurists according to the size of the fish, whether it was caught in fresh or salt water, and whether the dreamer bought it or received it as a gift from someone. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it. .. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman. Fish can appear in a dream for a married woman in different colors and sizes, and if she sees that she is taking a quantity of silver or white fish free of impurities, knowing that she is not a housewife but works in someone, she takes care of her work duties and carries them out. To the fullest, and as a result of her adherence to professional rules in her work, she will soon receive a lot of money from her work. A transparent or silver fish in her dream shows that she is transparent and that her heart is free of hatred and malice. It harms his wife and children. When she finds that she is buying red fish, eating it, cleaning it, or cooking it, then all of these visions are interpreted with one interpretation of happiness and a feeling of optimism in life, and she also carries in her heart beautiful feelings towards her husband. . And he lives a romantic life free of problems with him. If she sees her daughter in a dream eating red fish, knowing that this girl is unmarried and has the right to marry, then this is a positive sign that she will marry soon and restore her love life. When the dreamer cooks fish in a dream and notices that its color is green and fresh The dream indicates that she lives in an atmosphere of prosperity and wealth, and if she sees all her family members eating this green fish, then they are as well. She is united with God, and participates in various acts of worship and obedience, and therefore the vision heralds her filling her home with blessing. Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. A woman wants to satisfy a certain desire or desire for work or money, and she dreams of a lot of fish without blemishes, this indicates the fulfillment of difficult desires and the fulfillment of many Of ambitions. Longevity and strong health are signs of eating fresh fish in a dream for a married woman, and if her husband shares with her in eating fish, then the vision at that time indicates a happy marriage and its continuation despite the noses of haters. They feel psychological peace, contentment, and contentment, and therefore their lives will be happy even if there are some difficulties in life. If she dreams that her husband catches fresh fish, cleans them, and cooks them, then the dream indicates participation and cooperation between them in domestic and marital life in general, as her husband collects halal money and works hard. To meet his requirements. The family, while radiating positive energy at home and supporting her husband, and in life and providing him with a lot of money so that he can meet his family’s demands and not fall short in achieving them. It is known that the fish is in the sea or the river, but what about the dreamer seeing that the fish is hanging in the sky? This vision has a harsh meaning, and indicates bad circumstances that constitute an obstacle to him and make him unable to achieve his desires, but if he takes these fish despite the distance, then he will achieve all his ambitions despite the difficulties.

title: Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream according to Al-Osaimi is one of the interpretations that falls in the list of the dreams most searched for regarding its interpretation, as thunder is a questionable and frightening natural phenomenon, but what if you dream of thunder, is this a sign of good or bad? So allow us, through the summit platform, to provide you with all the questions about the interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi mentioned the meanings of seeing thunder in a dream, including: Sheikh Al-Osaimi explained that he heard the sound of thunder in a dream to everyone with various meanings, including goodness, increased sustenance, and blessing. Among them is fear and anxiety, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing thunder in a dream in a dream: kindness, living, paying debts, recovery from fatigue and illness, release from the chains of prisoners, comfort after sadness, and the arrival of good news to them. Hearing the sound of thunder without rain in a dream symbolizes anxiety. Fear and tension, and it is said to be suffering, distress, and financial problems. Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream for a single woman by Al-Osaimi. Al-Osaimi explained the most prominent interpretations of a dream about thunder for a single girl, the most famous of which are the following: The meaning of a girl hearing thunder in a dream indicates confusion, anxiety, distraction, despair, and suffering. Meanings of the sound of thunder and a feeling of happiness in The dream indicates comfort after distress, people with joy, happy events, and success for those who see it. Hearing the sound of thunder in a dream may be a divine sign of getting closer to God Almighty and staying away from desires and sins. Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream about a married woman by Al-OsaimiThe dream can indicate the life and life of a married woman Marital and her relationship with her children. Regarding this dream, Al-Usaimi interpreted it as follows: The meaning of hearing thunder at the right time and the right time in a woman’s dream indicates the arrival of good news, sustenance, and an alleviation of the situation for whoever sees it. Hearing the sound of thunder and feeling fear in a woman’s dream symbolizes anxiety, tension, and fear of what is coming, and God knows best. The meaning of the sound of thunder and the feeling of happiness in a woman’s dream symbolizes happy family conditions, abundance of goodness, and living space for whoever sees it. Hearing the loud sound of thunder in a woman’s dream also indicates quarrels between spouses, disagreements with her family, and suffering in life for the dreamer. Read more: Interpretation of seeing a promotion in a dreamInterpretation of a dream Thunder in a man’s dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi explained the most important interpretations of seeing thunder for a man, the most important of which are the following: The meanings of the sound of thunder and the feeling of happiness in a man’s dream symbolize the effort expended at work and the activity that characterizes the dreamer. Hearing thunder in a man’s dream symbolizes the orders and directions given to the monarch by his manager. Or from a toxic man in life, and God knows best. The sound of thunder in a man’s dream can serve as a warning to him that he is close to obeying God and fighting desires. Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream for a divorced woman. Thunder in a dream for a divorced woman indicates loneliness, sadness, and fear of the sound of thunder in A dream can indicate fear of being judged: If a divorced woman sees thunder and lightning during the day in a dream, this indicates the emergence of the truth and that

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about a child’s shoe from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about children’s shoes: A dream about a girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a divorced woman is the topic of our discussion today, as all interpretations differ according to the marital status of the fortuneteller, whether he bought it or someone gave it to her, and other details that must be specified at the beginning. Interpretation of a dream about children’s shoes by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream Child shoes? If the dreamer finds that he will see children’s shoes and does not need to buy one of them, this indicates his desire to make a radical change in his life so that he can overcome the difficult stage he is currently going through. Where he wishes to be a man without responsibilities and not bothered by the many burdens on his shoulders. If a girl stands in front of a store that sells children’s shoes and stops and thinks about them, then in reality she is walking with thoughts about her future life after marriage and the feelings of early motherhood that control her, and the difficulties that she faces. They may be There are some constructive ideas that the dreamer arranges during this period, to be a project owner in the future, and his thinking is not limited to working and working for others only, and he will be able to achieve this ambition after a while. A good study of the subject. Interpretation of a dream about baby shoes by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that any children’s clothing or anything related to an infant’s shoes is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to renew his life, as the single person accepts marriage after a long period of preparation. The dream means feeling great hope and great confidence that he is able to achieve his goals and efforts. Seeing a girl in this dream means that she lives with her common sense and innocence, but she must be vigilant in her relationships with others and not completely trust anyone, but her dream shows that she may marry a young man. Moral and religious character. As for the married woman who sees the child’s shoes, she will gain her husband’s approval, love, and respect for her, in addition to God providing her with good offspring that will please her eyes. Enter the Egyptian dream interpretation site from Google, you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Children’s shoes, dream interpretation for the single woman, if you take If a girl sees a baby shoe from someone she knows, in reality she will enter into an official relationship next time, so that a new, happier and happier phase will begin. Work. It is said that the girl has a good and indisputable personality in terms of religious and moral commitment, and she does not know the ways of dealing falsely and deceiving others. If the girl is wearing it, then in reality she has achieved the goal she seeks and is on her way to starting another task that she has taken as steps to reach To a new ambition. Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes for a young woman: If a girl sees that she is wearing shoes for a young child, she may get married quickly and find herself overnight playing the role of a good wife and an ideal mother, but if she is a student studying at a university or school, then she will stand out and achieve a high and distinguished position. Among the rest of the students and students, she is respected by her professors for her excellence and moral commitment. The unmarried girl who decorates a small child’s shoe with flowers is evidence of her overwhelming feeling of love towards everyone around her, and her coming days will bring

title: Interpretation of a dream about red carpets in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a red carpet in a dream Today, through a different website, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about a red carpet in a dream, as scholars have failed to interpret the dream, meaning that seeing a large carpet means a long life, and whoever sees himself laying old carpets, this indicates many problems and worries that will arise in that person’s life. The person, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about red carpets in a dream by Ibn Sirin, where the scholar Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees carpet threads in a dream, this indicates that this person is exposed to many diseases. To be for this person, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing yourself walking on the carpet in a dream. Whoever sees himself walking on the carpet, this indicates many good things and wide satisfaction that this person may attain. A prisoner from prison, and to be blessed with his visit to the House of God and the performance of the Hajj, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing clean carpets in a dream Seeing clean carpets in a dream indicates the arrival of kindness and sustenance. It also indicates the collapse of problems, worries, and problems to which the dreamer is exposed. It also indicates a happy marriage and good offspring, and that this person has good morals and that all people love him and wish him well. Seeing torn carpets in a dream Seeing torn carpets in a dream is an unpleasant dream, because it indicates anxiety, problems, and loss of blessings. It also indicates that the dreamer has run out of energy, which means that he cannot bear the misfortunes that he faces in his life and that they will lead him to illness and that he will surrender to them, and God Almighty knows best. Symbols of the color of carpets in a dream. The symbol of green carpets in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness and a lot of sustenance. Because green is one of the colors of spring, which indicates joy and happiness. The symbol of the blue carpet in the dream also indicates high ambitions and success in academic life. The orange carpet symbolizes the dreamer’s arrival at his ambitions and goals in his academic and professional life. As for the significance of the white carpet, this person Going for Hajj, and God Almighty knows best. As for the colored carpets, they indicate the arrival of joy, pleasure, and goodness to the dreamer’s face, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing cleaning the house and interpreting a dream about a red carpet in a dream. A dream about cleaning a house indicates the disappearance of problems and worries and getting rid of them, and because cleaning the house means getting rid of dirt. It also shows owning own projects and improving the situation for the better. The marriage of a single person and that he enjoys a life full of happiness, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing a wool carpet in a dream. Seeing wool carpets indicates the presence of good people in that person’s life, and it also shows a lot of nourishment that this person will receive. Interpretation of a dream about red carpets in a dream for a man. Scientists explained that if a man sees In his dream that he has bought carpets, this indicates that he will soon marry a fair wife, who will be the reason for his happiness, and may also be the fulfillment of everything he wished for. In his private life, it also shows the large expense that he will receive. Seeing a lost carpet in a dream. Scientists have interpreted that if the dreamer sees that he has lost the carpet, this is an unpleasant vision, as it

title: The interpretation of a dream about death in a dream indicates a great sin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing death in a dream. From Ibn Sirin that he said: Seeing death may be a great and major sin. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of connection to the world, distance from religion, and death of the heart, and for the dreamer it may indicate denial in the heart. Death in a dream can be interpreted as connection, marriage, or illness. And injury, and sometimes it refers to a barren land or a barren woman. Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream: I dreamed of dreams in a dream: being killed, then this dream means psychological comfort for you, and if you are sick, it means recovery from your illness. If you wake up from your death in a dream, this is evidence of wealth and livelihood after illness. Or repentance for sins. If you see that the dead came out of their graves and ate people’s food, this is a sign of rising prices. If you see a dead end on the road and walk behind this road, you will actually follow it. Interpretation of a dream about death for a sultan or ruler of the country means the spread of ruin, devastation and chaos in your country The death of a person naked in a dream means poverty after concealment and wealth. Death on the carpet indicates that his affairs in this world are improving and heading for the better. The death of a son in a dream is a sign of liberation from enemies and victory over them. If a person dreams that he revives the dead, this is a reason to convert a sinner or A Jew to Islam. If the deceased is disturbed, exhausted, or confused, you will encounter some things that confuse your mind. To dream that you are sitting and mingling with the dead means that you are mingling with people who are corrupt in their religion and in whom there is no good. Interpretation of one who sees himself dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin can indicate Interpretation of death in a dream indicates longevity, and whoever sees himself sick without dying. Or Khaled, who does not die, can die as a witness and the testimony is written about him. God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a dying person on a carpet has contributed to simplifying his earthly life. And seeing the dead naked in a dream It means poverty, may God protect us from it. Seeing a deceased person for the second time means that he may marry or bond with one of his daughters or sons, and it may be one of his grandchildren. Seeing death in bed indicates the high status of the dreamer, and when he sees the news of someone’s death, he reports his death, he becomes anxious and sad. And anguish, and God knows best. When you see a dead person die again and shed tears, this indicates joy and happiness, and the death of a dead person indicates the death of a relative, and God knows best. Seeing death in a dream may indicate moving to another place or traveling to some place. Seeing death may indicate poverty, and God knows best. Seeing death in a dream may indicate moving to another place or traveling to some place. Seeing death may indicate poverty, and God knows best. I know. Interpretation of seeing death in a dream for a man. When a man sees that he is dead, this indicates an engagement and marriage with a good and kind girl. The dead person also washes him, so he is like a groom preparing for a joyful night. Seeing death in a dream means that hypocrites surround the opinion and conspire against him in his life and work. When you dream that A dead person is a friend, so it means benefit from him or a trip to a country. Interpretation of seeing the dead coming out of the grave in a dream When you see coming out of death in a dream, and this from the grave indicates closeness to God, and the dreamer repents for the sins and disobedience he has done. Seeing a dead person in a dream and living after His death means betterment

Seeing death in a dream may indicate moving to another place or traveling somewhere. Seeing death may indicate poverty, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing death in a dream for a man When a man sees that he is dead, this indicates engagement and marriage to a good and kind girl. The dead person also washes him, so he is like a groom ready for a night of joy. Seeing death in a dream means that hypocrites surround the opinion and conspire against him in his life and work. When you dream that the dead person is a friend, this means benefit from him or a trip to a country. Interpretation of seeing the dead coming out of the grave in a dream When you see coming out of death in a dream, and this from the grave indicates closeness to God, and the dreamer repents for what he did of sins and disobedience. Seeing a dead person in a dream and living after his death means improving the

title: Interpretation of money in a dream

preview.html: If he takes it from a dead person, it shows protection, health and well-being in his life, God willing, and the dream is interpreted to indicate the large amount that this dreamer will receive in her life. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a single girl: Seeing an unmarried woman earning money from her work in a dream, and she was very happy. It is It indicates that it is almost good for her and that she will enjoy some of the things that she does in her life. The dream indicates that there is bad luck in the life of an unmarried woman and that she will suffer a lot in her life. A lot of money in a dream also explains the lack of kindness and living in an unmarried girl’s life. The married woman who dreams. It also explains that losing money in a job or a scam in the dream of an unmarried girl in a dream. Here is an indication of the bad things that will happen in reality and she will not overcome them until after a long time. The unmarried woman who sees money thrown on the ground collects it and takes it in Her dream. This is a sign of easy things in her life and getting rid of difficulties and problems. And that she will live comfortably in her life if she gives money to others for that. See also: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman who was taking money from Her husband is in a dream and she feels happy. It explains the good things that this dreamer will see and experience in her life. And if he sees a lot of money on the ground and wants to collect it but he refuses. It shows that she missed a great opportunity in her life at this time for her and she will live well. And the married woman The one who looks at money, and desperately wants to get it in her dream. Here the meaning explains the things that she is always looking for in her life at this time. The married woman who takes money from a stranger in her dream is happy. Here it indicates the abundance of her money and the increase in her comfort at this time of Her life, God willing. Money in a dream indicates happiness if it is especially for a married woman who dreams of her life. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a man and its meaningSeeing that the dreamer was taking money in a dream, collecting it in his pocket in the dream, and he was happy. It shows that he will soon find many things important task in his life at this time. The dream shows that he got rid of many of the difficult things that he saw and went through, and God knows best. And if he received money from people who knew him in the dream and he was very happy. Here it indicates the bad things that the dreamer will see in his life during this time. period of his life. The dream also indicates some difficulties in the dreamer’s life if he loses money. And if he gets money at his workplace in the dream, and he is happy from the large amount of money he has in the dream. Here it indicates that he will reach a high position in the dream without getting tired. Or misery for him. Also, seeing losing money in a dream indicates the great predicament that a man will fall into. Read also: Interpretation of dreams to receive money from an unknown person. Meaning of seeing money in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretationIf a married woman takes silver coins in a dream and collects them. Here it announces

title: Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by Imam Al-Sadiq, the letter Alif. The letter Alif is the beginning of many different words that can be symbols of things in our dreams, which need clarification, and that is why in our article we discuss the interpretation of dreams by Imam Al-Sadiq, the letter Alif, and see. What are the symbols of things that begin with this letter there is a mystery, and, God willing, this mystery will be solved. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream. Seeing a needle in a dream means a close marriage and a veil resulting from this marriage. If you see a damaged needle in In a dream, this indicates corruption in the soul and poverty in money. If a poor man sees her in a dream, this means abundance of sustenance, for one who will be rich. If a married man sees her in a dream, this means an increase in money. If the dreamer sees her and she needs something to satisfy his need, with permission God. If he sees her alone in a dream, this indicates his imminent marriage. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Satan in a dream. Seeing Satan (may God curse him) in a dream is evidence of sedition and heresy in religion, committing sins, and forbidding oneself. Interpretation of seeing an ear in a dream. Seeing a large ear in a dream is a sign of guidance from God and satisfaction with what He has divided. Interpretation of seeing land in a dream: Seeing agricultural land in a dream indicates fertility. If the land is destroyed in a dream, this indicates a general loss. The expansion of land in a dream is evidence of moving from a place and traveling. To a new place. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream. The sign of seeing a lion in a dream is death and injustice to people. Seeing a female lion in a dream means the presence of a woman with bad intentions searching for her. Interpretation of seeing a nose in a dream. Seeing a nose is evidence of bragging about feeding money and children. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dreamDreaming of a mother in a dream is evidence of close nourishment and relief from God. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dreamInterpretation of seeing pyramids in a dreamDream pyramids indicate ten foreigners. This can also indicate longevity.Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dreamDeer symbol In a dream, it indicates victory over enemies and getting rid of them. Interpretation of seeing eavesdropping in a dream: It has the meaning of giving false testimony and a big lie. It also suggests gossip and gossip. See also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream. Meaning that the fortuneteller is a coward, whether he is a man or a woman. If The dreamer saw that he is slaughtering a rabbit, this indicates the death of the marriage, meaning that divorce will happen soon. Interpretation of seeing geese in the dream has the meaning of the presence of a beautiful woman in the dreamer’s reality. Interpretation of bankruptcy in a dream If the dreamer sees that he is bankrupt, this indicates a lack of religion and injustice to people. Interpretation of seeing A jug in a dream: Seeing a jug in a dream means repentance to God from sin and disobedience. Interpretation of seeing verses from the Qur’an in a dream. The verses of martyrdom in the Qur’an indicate difficulties and fatigue in life. And the verses of mercy in the Qur’an indicate tranquility, peace of mind, and surrender to what God has commanded. Interpretation of seeing Abraham upon him.

title: The most important evidence of Ibn Sirin about yellow watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Yellow watermelon in a dreamIt may seem a little strange, as few people may experience such a vision that makes them doubt its meaning for them, whether it is good or bad, God forbid, so we will learn about the secrets of this vision through the interpretation of the great. Dream interpreters. Yellow watermelon in a dream by Ibn Sirinma Interpretation of yellow watermelon in a dream? Interpretation of a dream of yellow watermelon in a dream is a lot of worries that affect the dreamer and cause him many problems that do not have good consequences. Seeing him eating a yellow watermelon in a dream, and feeling happy For a pioneer, it is good news that he will receive a great benefit and perhaps join a job that he dreamed of and has been waiting for for a long time. Seeing yellow watermelon in a dream is a sign that the insight is exposed to a disease that he suffers from a lot and is subject to a long treatment journey, so the owner of the insight must maintain his health and follow instructions. The treating physician. Seeing yourself buying a yellow watermelon in a dream symbolizes experiencing a major financial loss and losing something precious to the dreamer’s heart. It can represent the loss of a person dear to the viewer’s heart and his going through a state of sadness. Yellow watermelon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing yellow watermelon in a dream as an incurable disease that afflicts the dreamer. A dream about eating a lot of yellow watermelon indicates many problems that the dreamer will face in the future. In the coming days. On the other hand, Ibn Sirin interpreted yellow watermelon in a dream as hearing bad news that brings sorrow to hearts and exhausts them with what they cannot bear. As for seeing yellow watermelon sold in a dream, it means depression and corruption in trade, while seeing someone growing yellow watermelon in a dream It means that he is a person who is humble to God Almighty and receives goodness and blessings for His sake. His life and work. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Yellow watermelon in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a yellow watermelon in an unmarried girl’s dream, and it was watermelon season. The vision is one of the good and praiseworthy visions that portends that this girl will marry in the near future and that her married life will be at its best. Dream interpreters also said that the size of the watermelon in the dream symbolizes the person with whom she is related, as the large size indicates exorbitant wealth for the future husband and a high level. Seeing a yellow watermelon cut into equal slices in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she is elegant and precise and that her engagement with the person her heart desires will come very soon. Seeing an unmarried woman worrying and regretting eating yellow watermelon indicates that the young man she is attached to is not a good fit. According to the opinions of interpretation scholars, seeing a married woman in a dream carrying a yellow watermelon indicates that she will become ill in the coming days. Eating yellow watermelon in a dream for a married woman is an indication of her suffering and exposure. For many marital problems and disorders, so

title: Interpretation of the full moon in a dream complements the correct interpretations

preview.html: You are in this article: Interpretation of the full moon in a dream. In detail, the moon of the planet Earth is one of the moons of the solar system and ranks fifth in size. It is the largest object appearing in the sky and brighter than any other object during the night. When a person sees a beautiful girl, he says: He is like the moon, and if he sees the moon in a dream, he wakes up confused because he does not know whether what he saw was a true vision that indicates something, or whether they are dreams that have no meaning or explanation. And similar to our article today for the encyclopedia, we show you the interpretation of a dream about the full moon for a man, a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of the full moon in a dream. Interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that if someone sees the full moon in a dream, this means that this person is close to God Almighty and wants to guide others to The path of truth. Also, the dream of the full moon is one of the visions promising the return of the traveler and the absent person and the repayment of the debt, and because it is one of the names of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, the dream may herald the owner of meeting the Prophet in Paradise. One of the undesirable interpretations is the dream of the moon, full but dark, and this dream indicates Indicates that the dreamer will suffer from an illness in the coming period. Whoever sees in a dream that the moon has been full and has appeared to him and he sees it clearly, his dreams indicate that his life will change for the better and that he will pay his debts or obtain a new position that will make him start a beautiful beginning in his life. The full moon in a man’s dream A single person indicates that the dreamer will marry a good girl and that God will make him happy with her. If a person sees in his dream the full moon and his face is there and it looks beautiful, then his dream shows that there is goodness on the way for him, but if he looks at the full moon and his face looks ugly. Then the dream warns its owner that he will suffer crises in the coming period. A dream about the full moon turning into the sun indicates that the dreamer will benefit from his wife with many good things that will come back to him. When one dreams that the full moon is running across the sky, this means that the dreamer will get married or have the opportunity to travel. One of the most promising visions is the dream of the full moon and its closeness to the dreamer. This dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to fulfill a long-awaited desire and it could be a new job, a wedding, or a trip. The full moon in a dream for singles. The full moon in a dream for an unmarried girl is a praiseworthy interpretation. This dream is an indication that her life will change for the better and that she will achieve great success in her life or find a new job. This vision also shows that God Almighty will make the life of the dreamer full of happiness and joy. Whoever sees in her dream the full moon and the sun next to her, her dream indicates that she will marry a man Good morals, and that God Almighty will make her happy in her life with him. An unmarried girl’s dream of the full moon and its bright appearance symbolizes that the dreamer is close to God, has good morals, and is trying to gain God’s satisfaction by doing good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about the full moon in a married woman’s dreamThe full moon indicates in a woman’s dream The married woman indicates that she will be blessed with goodness in the coming period, and that there is provision on the way to her husband, and that God Almighty will bless her and her family with happiness. Whoever sees in her dream that the moon is full and a full moon appears

A dream about the full moon turning into the sun indicates that the dreamer will benefit from his wife with many good things that will come back to him. When one dreams that the full moon is running across the sky, this means that the dreamer will get married or have the opportunity to travel. One of the most promising visions is the dream of the full moon and its closeness to the dreamer.
